body.title: Purpose of the project
body.text:
My Navy was created in the first year of Epitech. The objective was to develop the game battleship in terminal version.

Also called hit-and-sink, My Navy is a game in which two players must place
on a secret grid and try to

the opponent's ships.

The winner is the one who manages to sink all the opponent's ships before all of their own ships are sunk.

body.title: How it works
body.text: It was necessary for 2 terminals to be able to communicate using signals to share the positions selected by the players.
